ygData.subject: tattooed bellybuttons (was Re: Re: What to buy?)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm.. I looked at myself, and I couldn t see it.  Are you both female characters?  Maybe that s the diff. :) -Raean Bloodyhands, Monk of the 26th Fist, Ashen
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm.. I looked at myself, and I couldn't see it. Are you both female
characters? Maybe that's the diff. :)

-Raean Bloodyhands, Monk of the 26th Fist, Ashen Order, Tunare.


> From: Caza Gaming <mecaza@...>
>
> yep, me too. The Foreman's tunic / cured pants combo
> still shows a tattooed belly button :-))
>
> (It is the pants that are the secret). Put on just
> the Foremans.. no tattoo.. add the pants - viola!
>
> Looks cooooooll
>
> Merilyn, Sister of the Ashen Order on Xegony
